welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ban Son Loi, a charming city known for its beautiful temples and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience our unique culture and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights operated by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, currently under construction and set to open in 2022.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 2 hours by providing their passport information.
